item.title: Information For Nico Nico Net Super Conference 2020 Revealed!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Hello everyone! Today I’ll be showing you all the information regarding the “Nico Nico Net Super Conference 2020” which was revealed not long ago! Super Kabuki 2020 Main Visual  Introducing “VOCALOID Fes” VOCALOID Fes is a live show focused on VOCALOID music. Various VOCALOID characters will make their appearance on “VOCALOID Live“. Other shows like …

The post Information For Nico Nico Net Super Conference 2020 Revealed! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Hello everyone!

Today I’ll be showing you all the information regarding the “Nico Nico Net Super Conference 2020” which was revealed not long ago!

Super Kabuki 2020 Main Visual 

Introducing “VOCALOID Fes”

VOCALOID Fes is a live show focused on VOCALOID music.

Various VOCALOID characters will make their appearance on “VOCALOID Live“. Other shows like “VOCALOID DJ” will be featured as well.

You can watch VOCALOID Fes live on the net! More details on this are available by reading our article here.

“Nico Nico Net Super Conference 2020”

The “Nico Nico Net Super Conference 2020” is scheduled to be take place April 12 to April 19, 2020! Eight days of pure VOCALOID fun!

During the event, at the top part of the Nico Nico official website will feature what’s called the “Net Super Meeting Room“, where various entertainment companies existing in Japan will gather with the aim to become Japan’s largest internet festival.

In addition, this event will go beyond Nico Nico to form alliances with various media sites and companies in order to expand Japanese net culture to the world. Details will be announced at a later date.

Nico Nico Net Super Conference 2020 Sponsored by NTT

  • Date: April 12 to April 19, 2020
  • Organizer: Nico Nico Super Conference Executive Committee
  • Super Special Sponsor: NTT
  • Official Website: Here
  • Official Twitter: Here

Sponsors List

Super Special Sponsor: NTT

Sponsored by VOCALOID Fes: Tobu Top Tours Co., Ltd.

Other Sponsors: Airbnb / # Compass-Battle Providence Analysis System

Super Kabuki Supported by NTT Performance Overview

  • Performance Name: おとぎぞうしこいのすがたえ
  • Broadcast Date and Time:

April 18, 2020 @ 14:00 PM JPT: “Super Kabuki 2020” Nico Nico Douga
April 19, 2020 @ 18:00 PM JPT: “Super Kabuki 2020” Nico Nico Douga

  • Performers: Shido Nakamura, Miku Hatsune, Butterfly Nakamura, Kuniya Sawamura and others
  • Screenplay: Ryo Matsuoka
  • Director: Kanjuro Fujima
  • Song: “Romeo and Cinderella”
  • Organizer: Nico Nico Super Conference Executive Committee
  • Production: Shochiku Co., Ltd./Dwango Co., Ltd.
  • Production Assistance: Crypton Future Media Co., Ltd.
  • Super Special Sponsor / Technical Assistance: NTT

Check out the “Super Kabuki 2020” Official Website for more information.

VOCALOID Fes

“Vocaloid Live”

Performers: Hatsune Miku, Kagamine Rin, Kagamine Len, Gumi, Otomachi Una, flower, Yukari Yuzuki

“Vocaloid DJ”

Dates & Times: April 18, 2020 @ 18:00 – 20:20 PM JPT
1) 18:00 – 18:45 PM JPT – “sasakure.UK & Pinocchiopie” Live DJ (Free)
2) 18:45 – 19:50 PM JPT – “flower & Yukari Yukari” Live DJ (Free)
3) 19:50 – 20:20 PM JPT – VOCALOID Live (Paid)

Click here for more details!

Ticket Price: ¥ 4,800 (tax included)

Click here for relevant information regarding ticket purchasing.

“VOCALOID Fes Merchandise”

VOCALOID Fes’ exceptional merchandise will be available for purchase for everybody!

These include but are not limited to:

  • Limited Edition Illustration designed by popular artist “Yasan“
  • T-shirt (M / L / XL size): 2,800 yen (tax included)
  • Muffler Towel: 1,500 yen (tax included)
  • Acrylic Stand Key Holders: 800 yen (tax included)

Sources

Hatsune Miku Official Blog

The post Information For Nico Nico Net Super Conference 2020 Revealed! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Hatsune Miku Mobile’s Gift Campaign Is Live!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Hatsune Miku Mobile is holding an in-game gift campaign that allows you to obtain amazing goods and deals for SNOW MIKU 2020, according to official sources. 【ミクモバ】初音ミクモバイルではスゴ得限定でSNOW MIKU 2020の素敵なグッズをGETできちゃうプレゼントキャンペーンを実施中！応募期間は1/31 11:00～2/13 11:00まで！まずは見てみて♪https://t.co/rQhPxB1QvT #初音ミク #雪ミク #ミクモバ #スゴ得 pic.twitter.com/82SAWPs5xz — 初音ミク 公式 (@cfm_miku) February 3, 2020 These goods include luxurious content that is exclusive to SNOW MIKU 2020 …

The post Hatsune Miku Mobile’s Gift Campaign Is Live! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Hatsune Miku Mobile is holding an in-game gift campaign that allows you to obtain amazing goods and deals for SNOW MIKU 2020, according to official sources.

【ミクモバ】初音ミクモバイルではスゴ得限定でSNOW MIKU 2020の素敵なグッズをGETできちゃうプレゼントキャンペーンを実施中！応募期間は1/31 11:00～2/13 11:00まで！まずは見てみて♪https://t.co/rQhPxB1QvT
#初音ミク #雪ミク #ミクモバ #スゴ得 pic.twitter.com/82SAWPs5xz

— 初音ミク 公式 (@cfm_miku) February 3, 2020

These goods include luxurious content that is exclusive to SNOW MIKU 2020 and we’ll detail them below:

  • “Sapporo Snow Festival” at 11th Street, Odori Venue featuring a new snow statue map of “Snow Miku Snow Parade Ver.”
  • TeddyLoid will be appearing at the “Winter Night Vivace !!” club event on Friday, February 7, 2020.
  • Limited production album “Planet Traveler feat. Hatsune Miku” will be released.
  • Limited production album made by the label KARENT will be released again this year alongside a special CD featuring the “SNOW MIKU 2020” theme song “Pikapaka no Hoshi” and many other songs that were recorded just for this.

We’re surely very excited for what’s to come and we cannot wait to check this amazing content as it releases! Let us know what you think in the comments!

Links

SNOW MIKU 2020’s Official Website

Karent’s Official Website

The post Hatsune Miku Mobile’s Gift Campaign Is Live! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Sakura Miku to be at Hirosaki Neputa Festival this August!
item.dc:creator: vocazn93
item.description:
Do you remember how Sakura Miku was this year’s mascot for Hirosaki’s Cherry Blossom Festival? Well, just as announced by Hatsune Miku’s official Twitter account, she’ll make a comeback to celebrate Hirosaki Neputa Festival in August! 【お知らせ】来年の春に100回目を迎える「弘前さくらまつり」の公式応援キャラクターになった桜ミクが「弘前ねぷたまつり」ともコラボ決定！本日はイラストを公開していきますよー！まずはiXimaさんによる浴衣姿の桜ミク！大迫力のねぷたとの共演です！ #初音ミク #桜ミク #弘前ねぷたまつり pic.twitter.com/Ko4NVcb8LQ — 初音ミク 公式 (@cfm_miku) July 6, 2019 What is the Hirosaki Neputa Festival? The …

The post Sakura Miku to be at Hirosaki Neputa Festival this August! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Do you remember how Sakura Miku was this year’s mascot for Hirosaki’s Cherry Blossom Festival? Well, just as announced by Hatsune Miku’s official Twitter account, she’ll make a comeback to celebrate Hirosaki Neputa Festival in August!

【お知らせ】来年の春に100回目を迎える「弘前さくらまつり」の公式応援キャラクターになった桜ミクが「弘前ねぷたまつり」ともコラボ決定！本日はイラストを公開していきますよー！まずはiXimaさんによる浴衣姿の桜ミク！大迫力のねぷたとの共演です！ #初音ミク #桜ミク #弘前ねぷたまつり pic.twitter.com/Ko4NVcb8LQ

— 初音ミク 公式 (@cfm_miku) July 6, 2019

What is the Hirosaki Neputa Festival?

The Hirosaki Neputa festival is an annual event that is held through August 1st through the 7th. 80 groups participate by walking through the city in fan shaped floats created by each group called “Fan Neputa (扇ねぷた)” with them being defined as: large fan-shaped floats depicting epic and fantastic images of warriors – parade through the town. In 1980, Hirosaki Neputa Festival was designated as an Important Intangible Folk Cultural Properties of Japan.

Want to know more about the event? Check out Aomori’s sightseeing guide page about it!

A Cherry Blossom Diva Enchanting the Roads!

This year Sakura Miku, a very well known derivative of Miku that is portrayed as a pink colored version with cherry blossom trees in mind; will be representing the festival this year with many collaborative merchandise.

Four key illustrations have been unveiled for this collaboration event, one by the main Crypton Future Media VOCALOID series illustrator, iXima. Who is the lead illustrator for this event:

弘前ねぷたまつりと「桜ミク」がコラボ　ラッピング車両や限定タクシーなど https://t.co/gpHHL7AF9p さくらまつりに引き続き、弘前ねぷたまつりで桜ミクさんコラボです！浴衣の桜ミクさんと扇ねぷたを描きました。よろしくお願いします pic.twitter.com/JGA5oVnAFE

— Eko iXima (@iximaxima) July 6, 2019

But alongside our beloved Hatsune Miku official illustrator, three other artworks were also introduced for us:

By Nazyo:

【続々・お知らせ】今回もお祭りに合わせて様々な企画が盛り沢山です！コラボポスターやスタンプラリーも予定されていますよ！詳細は月曜日の初音ミク公式blogでお届け予定です！こちらは元気いっぱいにねぷたまつりを楽しむなじょさんのイラストですよ！ #初音ミク #桜ミク #弘前ねぷたまつり pic.twitter.com/22GCRHIEaw

— 初音ミク 公式 (@cfm_miku) July 6, 2019

nekosumi‘s artworks shows us Sakura Miku accompanied by the festival’s official mascot: Takamaru-kun!è

【続々々・お知らせ】そして！さくらまつりに引き続き今回も弘前市のゆるキャラ「たか丸くん」とのコラボイラストも！描いていただいたのはnekosumiさんです！法被と金魚ねぷたでお祭り参加の準備万端ですね！ #初音ミク #桜ミク #弘前ねぷたまつり pic.twitter.com/DB1hGap6xt

— 初音ミク 公式 (@cfm_miku) July 6, 2019

And last but not least the artwork made by Kiyamachi!

【続・お知らせ】「弘前ねぷたまつり」は8/1（木）～8/7（水）の期間で行われます！お近くの方は是非遊びにきてくださいね！こちらは木屋町さんの描く幻想的な桜ミクイラストです！桜ミクの周りをふよふよと泳ぐ「金魚ねぷた」が可愛いですよね～♪ #初音ミク #桜ミク #弘前ねぷたまつり pic.twitter.com/pFOimwvm6W

— 初音ミク 公式 (@cfm_miku) July 6, 2019

They prepared various kinds of promotion activities for this event. In fact, you will find B2 size and strip type posters all around public places, and even a museum booth at Machinaka Information Center.

But there is more of course! Such as Sakura Miku-themed trains and taxis offered by Hokusei Traffic and Konan Railway to a very special Sakura Miku stamp rally starting on July 27th, and they will also hold a lantern contest during the festival, a contest tradition that began in 2016 with “Flying Witch” as theme.

We will get more details about activities and merchandise in the near future, so please stay tuned with us!

Source

With this much content for the giant fan floats, especially with a vibrant pink Miku involved, there will be much fun and celebration at this Hirosaki Neputa festival. Be excited!

Hatsune Miku is on Facebook (English and Japanese) and Twitter (English and Japanese)!
You can find the article this information was discovered on here!
Hirosaki Tourism website and Facebook page

The post Sakura Miku to be at Hirosaki Neputa Festival this August! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Luo Tianyi and Hatsune Miku join with many at this year’s DIVE XR FESTIVAL!
item.dc:creator: vocazn93
item.description:
On July 5th, the official twitter for Dive XR Festival released a tweet revealing who will be at this year’s festival event, including two Vocaloids! The Event The Dive XR festival is a collaboration event where many franchises and Japanese influencers come together and perform in their best suited skill. In 2019, they are inviting …

The post Luo Tianyi and Hatsune Miku join with many at this year’s DIVE XR FESTIVAL! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
On July 5th, the official twitter for Dive XR Festival released a tweet revealing who will be at this year’s festival event, including two Vocaloids!

アニメ・ゲームのキャラクターやバーチャルシンガー、VTuberやAIたちが集まる音楽の祭典「DIVE XR FESTIVAL supported by SoftBank」開催決定！
7/6(土)18時よりチケット販売開始！

9/22(日)・9/23(月・祝)幕張メッセhttps://t.co/Ggqj4fM7YN #divexrfes pic.twitter.com/QYMNUQRTmT

— DIVE XR FESTIVAL (@dive_pj) July 5, 2019

The Event

The Dive XR festival is a collaboration event where many franchises and Japanese influencers come together and perform in their best suited skill. In 2019, they are inviting all digital performers from Vocaloids to Virtual youtubers, even gacha game bands to the mix! The event is also supported by Softbank.

Tickets will be available on July 6th, at 18:00 or 6Pm. Tickets are ¥ 8,800 or roughly $81 per person. Children ages 2 and younger are not allowed. This event will be held at the Makuhari Messe Exhibition Hall 1-3 (Nakase Mihama Ward, Chiba City).

You can purchase tickets in an array of places:

  • Eplus
  • Yahoo! Japan
  • Lawson Ticket
  • Ticket Pia
  • LINE ticket
  • SOGO TOKYO

They have added a way to purchase tickets for English audiences as well as Chinese in Traditional and Simplified here!

Dates

This event will take place September 22nd through the 23rd. With exact dates and times being:

September 22 (Sun) Noon Opening 11:00 – Closing 12:00
September 22 (Sun) Night Opening 17:00 – Closing 18:00
September 23 (Mon, Holiday) Opening 11: 00 – Closing 12:00

Collaboration partners

In the same tweet as before, the official twitter posted an image of which characters will be preforming at this event. On their website, it’s stated not every performer will be there on the same day, but collectively on both days.

On September 22nd: Ensemble Stars!(Trickstar, UNDEAD, and Knights), ARP, EMMA HAZY MINAMI, Kashikomari, Kizuna AI, Hatsune Miku, Fuji Mochi, Monster Z MATE, YuNi, Rinna, Luo Tianyi and more!

On September 23rd: AVATAR 2.0 1st All Stars, Ensemble Stars! (Trickstar, UNDEAD, and Knights), Kaminariai feat. Boyackey, Galactic Alice, Ruka Ishino Ruki / Raku Ishino Roki, SHOWROOM Virtual Unit Project, Cyber ​​Girl Shiro, Toki no Sora, Hatsune Miku, Hibiki Ao, HIME HINA Suzuki Hina, Marinasu (provisional), Miss Monochrome, Miraiakari, Luo Tianyi, and more!

With this much diversity and talent in these performers, there is no doubt that this event will be very exciting for fans of Vocaloid, Virtual singers and youtubers!

Source

It will be an exciting couple of days when this event comes to the table. All these colorful characters from all kinds of franchises is sure to bring many fans of all together and enjoy everything!

Hatsune Miku is on Facebook (English and Japanese) and Twitter (English and Japanese)!
Dive XR Festival’s events details are on their website and Twitter!
You can find Luo Tianyi on Facebook and Twitter!

 

 

The post Luo Tianyi and Hatsune Miku join with many at this year’s DIVE XR FESTIVAL! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: A VOCALOTRACKS Song Contest for Megpoid’s 10th anniversary is Here!
item.dc:creator: vocazn93
item.description:
Megpoid‘s 10th anniversary was on June 26th of 2019. The well known Vocaloid music label, VOCALOTRACKS, released an announcement that they will be holding a song contest for Megpoid’s 10th anniversary. Contest details 📢VOCALOID Megpoid発売10周年を記念して #GUMI が歌う🎤オリジナル楽曲を募集❗世界🌏🌎🌍へ向けて全曲配信手続きを実施。（規定有）🗓7/29（月）15時まで。VOCALOID4 Megpoid 最大40%OFFキャンペーンも実施中　https://t.co/CXZMEZNTMB #vocaloid#vocalotracks#GUMI生誕祭2019#GUMI誕生祭2019 pic.twitter.com/LeAEo3VWhd — VOCALOTRACKS (@VOCALOTRACKS) June 27, 2019 VOCALOTRACKS has given many details and specifics about this …

The post A VOCALOTRACKS Song Contest for Megpoid’s 10th anniversary is Here! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Megpoid‘s 10th anniversary was on June 26th of 2019. The well known Vocaloid music label, VOCALOTRACKS, released an announcement that they will be holding a song contest for Megpoid’s 10th anniversary.

Contest details

VOCALOID Megpoid発売10周年を記念して #GUMI が歌うオリジナル楽曲を募集世界へ向けて全曲配信手続きを実施。（規定有）7/29（月）15時まで。VOCALOID4 Megpoid 最大40%OFFキャンペーンも実施中　https://t.co/CXZMEZNTMB #vocaloid#vocalotracks#GUMI生誕祭2019#GUMI誕生祭2019 pic.twitter.com/LeAEo3VWhd

— VOCALOTRACKS (@VOCALOTRACKS) June 27, 2019

VOCALOTRACKS has given many details and specifics about this contest. The requirements for voicebanks are simple, all Megpoid banks are viable. The application dateline is June 26th through July 29th. The songs can either be new and unpublished or not, any genre is welcome. However, if the song is attached to another label and under specific copyright that it may not be able to used elsewhere, is not allowed.

Songs that are on CD’s are allowed, but only if the rights are available. If there are multiple credits to a song, only one person of that song can upload it. Music using anything that isn’t Megpoid is not allowed, even in harmonies or backing vocals.

Song requirements

In this announcement, the page has listed guidelines for what each song should follow. People who enter will need to register an account, giving their name, email and phone number. This rule is only for first time contest entries for VOCALOTRACKS.

The announcement also gives very detailed information about specifics of the song and file that the song will be on. The file must be in .wav format, in 16 bit and up to 44.1 kHz. The song file must be up to 65 megabytes and up to 6 minutes long. The lyrics must also be available in a .txt file. The thumbnail image must be up to 2500 x 2500 pixels, within an aspect ratio of 1:1. It is also the same with the full photo, but it can be varied depending on the site posted.

There must be credits of every person that worked on the song, especially of the copyright holder.

Every person has a limit of 2 songs.

Distribution sites

Pick up songs from the contest will be available  though the following websites in Japan :

  • iTunes
  • Amazon
  • AWA
  • Google
  • KKBOX
  • Line music
  • Mora
  • Spotify
  • Youtube
  • Rekochok
  • others (unlisted)

While overseas will find them through those websites instead:

  • iTunes(International)
  • Amazon
  • eMusic T-Mobile World Wide
  • Google music
  • KKBOX
  • Spotify
  • etc…

Extra notes

The announcement also details extra notes, just for clarification.

Any information regarding anything of the song cannot be changed after the deadline. If you are under 20 years old, you must have parental consent before entering. You must apply for consent, and written consent is allowed. Finally, you need to be able to say if your entry or entries infringe on any copyright.

That is all that the article says, follow VOCALOTRACKS on twitter for more updates about this contest! It is certain many great composers from Japan and all over the world will make amazing entries, be waiting!

With this, all of the Internet Co. Ltd vocaloids are now 40% sale off! Check it out if you are interested!

【最大40%OFF】#VOCALOID Megpoid発売10周年を記念して当社VOCALOIDライブラリを特別価格でご提供ボーカロイドミュージック配信専用レーベル「VOCALOTRACKS」では、#Megpoid が歌う楽曲を募集中今からお求めの上ご応募いただくことも可能https://t.co/btNNq8giPC#GUMI#GUMI誕生祭2019 pic.twitter.com/87Sh8MHIg3

— shopsswjp (@shopsswjp) June 27, 2019

You can find GUMI on Facebook and Twitter
Same goes for Internet Co. Ltd, which also has english-speaking social medias! Find them on Facebook (Japanese/English) or Twitter (Japanese/English).
Contest page

The post A VOCALOTRACKS Song Contest for Megpoid’s 10th anniversary is Here! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: AHS Characters x The CHARA Shop Collaboration Has Begun!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
It’s time for some juicy news for all of the AHS Co. Ltd. character fans! Starting from March 15th until the 27th, there will be a lot of their merchandise on sale at The CHARA Shop located on the 7th floor of Ikebukuro Marui! Cute Merchandise for Adorable Characters! We all know and love the …

The post AHS Characters x The CHARA Shop Collaboration Has Begun! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
It’s time for some juicy news for all of the AHS Co. Ltd. character fans! Starting from March 15th until the 27th, there will be a lot of their merchandise on sale at The CHARA Shop located on the 7th floor of Ikebukuro Marui!

Cute Merchandise for Adorable Characters!

We all know and love the characters from the AHS cast, especially when it comes to their VOCALOIDs and VOICEROIDs, so we were really amazed to see such a great collaboration involving all of them! Starting from March 15th (Today) until the 27th, The CHARA Shop will offer a huge variety of items themed after these characters! No matter what your tastes are, you will surely find something to bring home!

Are you visiting Japan right now? Here is the location, in case you want to pay a visit!

You will find The CHARA Shop at Ikebukuro Marui’s 7th floor. The collaboration started on March 15th, but will keep going until the 27th!

Merchandise on Sale

As they already showed us during their AHS Livestream held on February 20th, there are a lot of goods you will be able to pick up and bring home! Check them out below!

All of the goods are absolutely adorable and will bring your love for the AHS characters on a whole other level! Below you can find the price list.

  • Can Badges (18 variants, picked randomly): 400 JPY each
  • Big Acrylic Keychain (5 variants): 1,100 JPY each
  • Acrylic Stands(8 variants): 1,000 JPY each
  • Pass Case (6 variants): 1,200 JPY each
  • Microfiber Cloth (5 variants): 600 JPY each
  • B2 Tapestry (5 variants): 3,000 JPY each
  • Notebook-type Smartphone Case (4 variants): 3,500 JPY each
  • Mug (2 variants): 1,500 JPY each

Tax are not included.

VOCALOIDs and VOICEROIDs on Sale

If you are a VOCALOID or a VOICEROID user, this might be your lucky day! In fact, alongside the goods, their voice libraries will be on sale as well! This will be the perfect chance for you to grab your favorite voice and software and bring them home!

VOCALOID Banks

Getting a boxed version of their dream VOCALOID character is pretty much a dream for every user, isn’t it? If you want your favorite AHS voice bank and are visiting Japan, then you should totally stop by! Below you can find the prices for each product.

  • Yuzuki Yukari V4: 10,800 JPY for single voicebanks and 23,800 JPY for the bundle
  • Kizuna Akari: 10,800 JPY
  • Yuzuki Yukari V4 Jun + Kizuna Akari bundle: 17,800 JPY
  • Nekomura Iroha V4: 10,800 JPY for single voicebanks and 17,800 JPY for the bundle
  • SF-A2 miki V4 Natural: 9,800 JPY
  • Hiyama Kiyoteru V4:  10,800 JPY for single voicebanks and 17,800 JPY for the bundle
  • Kaai Yuki V4 Natural: 9,800 JPY
  • Tohoku Zunko V4 Natural: 9,800 JPY
  • Macne Nana (Natural and English) & Nana Pètit V4: 10,800 JPY for single voicebanks and 23,800 JPY for the bundle
  • Haruno Sora: 10,800 JPY for single voicebanks and 17,800 JPY for the bundle

Taxes are not included.

VOICEROID Banks

VOICEROIDs are the most popular talking voice libraries released and probably one of the AHS products people look more forward to alongside VOCALOID. These voices are exactly what you need if you plan to host live streams without talking yourself. Each has a different tone and personality in their vocals, and you can choose the ones you prefer to be your “talking companion”!

  • Haruno Sora (VOICEROID2): 11,980 JPY
  • Tohoku Itako (VOICEROID2): 16,800 JPY
  • Yuzuki Yukari (VOICEROID2):  14,800 JPY
  • Kizuna Akari (VOICEROID2): 11,980 JPY
  • Kotonoha Akane & Aoi (VOICEROID2): 17,800 JPY
  • Tohoku Zunko, Tohoku Kiritan, Minase Kou, Kyomachi Seika, Tsurumaki Maki, Tsukuyomi Ai and Shouta (VOICEROID+ EX all cast): 11,000 JPY each
  • Yoshida-kun (VOICEROID+ EX): 16,000 JPY

Taxes are not included!

Lottery

Last but not least, they will also hold a special lottery with some exclusive prizes! You can participate for every 3,000 JPY in purchases of AHS-themed goods at the shop. These prizes are only available in limited quantity and are probably going to sell out fast, so get ready to participate as soon as you can!

Prizes range from signed posters of Yukari to special bromides featuring all of the characters. Read below for some more details.

  • A: Signed Poster by Chihiro Ishiguro (Only one winner)
  • B: Signed Poster by Chihiro Ishiguro  (2 Winners)
  • C: Bromide set (All 8 variants)
  • D: Bromide (Picked randomly)

Remember you cannot choose which bromide you get with prize D. However, you get them all  for prize C.

Have a Good Shopping Trip

We instantly fell in love with this collaboration the moment they showed us their merchandise and we are confident you will find something that suits your tastes. With that said, have a good shopping time with your favorite characters from AHS and their partners at The CHARA Shop!

Stay tuned with us on VNN to never lose any update about your favorite Virtual Singers

AHS x The CHARA Shop Collaboration Page

item.description:
The new Virtual Singer duo Meika Hime and Mikoto, recently unveiled by Gynoid, are now available for pre-order in digital version via Amazon JP! Digital Editions Pre-orders We were eagerly waiting for those two vocalists to be also available as downloadable editions, and it’s finally time for all the users that were interested in them …

The post VOCALOID5 and Gynoid Talk Meika Hime and Mikoto Download Version Up for Pre-order! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The new Virtual Singer duo Meika Hime and Mikoto, recently unveiled by Gynoid, are now available for pre-order in digital version via Amazon JP!

Digital Editions Pre-orders

We were eagerly waiting for those two vocalists to be also available as downloadable editions, and it’s finally time for all the users that were interested in them to jump in the pre-order train! Hime and Mikoto are available both as a bundle and separate vocals, for both the softwares! Let’s check their prices below!

VOCALOID5 Voice Library Meika Hime and Mikoto Bundle – 17,280 JPY

Click here to buy the Bundle’s Digital version.

  • VOCALOID5 Meika Hime – 10,800 JPY
  • VOCALOID5 Meika Mikoto – 10,800 JPY

For their  VOCALOID5 individual voice libraries, click here for Hime or here for Mikoto’s vocals

Gynoid Talk Meika Hime and Mikoto Bundle – 17,280 JPY

Click here to pre-order the Bundle’s Digital version.

  • Gynoid Talk Meika Hime – 10,800 JPY
  • Gynoid Talk Meika Mikoto – 10,800 JPY

For their Gynoid Talk individual voice libraries, click here to pre-order Hime or here for Mikoto’s vocals

Meika Hime and Mikoto Voice Pack – 2,700 JPY

Click here to pre-order their Voice Pack (includes 2000+ vocal samples of them both!)

Where to Purchase

You can find and buy them all via Gynoid’s Amazon JP Store by clicking here. Their independent store also sell their physical edition! You can find them here, priced at 18,000 JPY in bundle. Each product is scheduled to release on March 30th.

And remember, stay tuned with us on VNN for all the news and updates of your favorite Virtual Singers!

item.title: Meika Hime and Mikoto and Their Demo Songs Officially Revealed!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Gynoid‘s latest addition to their vocalist cast, Meika Hime and Mikoto, took the fanbase by storm with their leak on Amazon JP a few hours ago. Now, the two are officially announced by the company, alongside their demo songs on the VOCALOID5 engine! Downloadable Content With their official reveal, Gynoid also shows us not only …

The post Meika Hime and Mikoto and Their Demo Songs Officially Revealed! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Gynoid‘s latest addition to their vocalist cast, Meika Hime and Mikoto, took the fanbase by storm with their leak on Amazon JP a few hours ago. Now, the two are officially announced by the company, alongside their demo songs on the VOCALOID5 engine!

Downloadable Content

With their official reveal, Gynoid also shows us not only their full bodies drawn by Miwashiba, but also a pair of MMD model of them made by mqdl and a set of standing poses materials drawn by Niijima Akiichi!

Those free downloadable materials will be released on their website on March 30th, so stay tuned!

Extra Voice Pack

You will also be able to buy an extra voice pack of both Hime and Mikoto on Amazon JP! This voice pack features 2000 voice samples (1000 for each character).

Click here to go to its product page.

Demo Songs

Thanks to the addition of their product pages on Gynoid’s website, we can now discover a lot more about these two new virtual singers appearing to be themed after plums! The most important update, however, comes with their VOCALOID5 official product page: where we can now listen to their demo songs, all composed by talented producers! Check them out below!

Special Girl by rerulili, featuring Meika Hime and Mikoto (duet)

Angel by Kairiki Bear, featuring Meika Mikoto

Buglug by seeeeecun, featuring Meika Hime

Meika by Koiwai Kotori, featuring Meika Hime and Mikoto (duet)

Thanks to those demos, we are finally able to hear both of Hime and Mikoto at their finest! We can also hear their speech samples at the very beginning of the videos, which appear to be quite HQ!

You can check their official page on Gynoid’s website by clicking here.

Their VOCALOID voice libraries are available in both digital and physical versions via Amazon JP

  • Click here to pre-order their Digital Version (Download)
  • Click here to pre-order their Physical Version (Boxed)

Gynoid Talk

Hime and Mikoto are the first known character to possess their own speech voicebank on this engine and its official of course!

Although there is no demo for their talking banks, you can test them out by using the textbox above on their Gynoid Talk product page! Select one of the two characters, write a sentence, and press the red button to hear them talk!

Their Gynoid Talk software is available in both digital and physical versions via Amazon JP

  • Click here to pre-order their Digital Version (Download)
  • Click here to pre-order their Physical Version (Boxed)

More Information

We can pretty much confirm all of the details we wrote on our previous article about Hime and Mikoto’s Amazon leak, so if you missed it and want to know more about the new virtual singers from Gynoid, you should really check it out!

While we wait for their release on March 30th, stay tuned with us on VNN for more updates on your favorite Virtual Singers!

Leaked Two New VOCALOID5: Meika Hime and Mikoto!
VOCALOID5 Meika Hime and Mikoto Product Page on Gynoid’s Website
Gynoid Talk Meika Hime and Mikoto Product Page on Gynoid’s Website
Gynoid Official Twitter Account
Official Press Release
Reveal Tweets

The post Meika Hime and Mikoto and Their Demo Songs Officially Revealed! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: New VOCALOID5 leaked: Haruno Sora!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Not long ago we talked about YAMAHA’s VOCALOID Shop relaunching soon with multiple products being discontinued, and now, out of the blue, we get a new potential virtual singer listed on Amazon JP: developed by AHS Co. Ltd. Meet Haruno Sora, which seems to be an upcoming addition to VOCALOID’s next engine the unannounced VOCALOID5. What we know …

The post New VOCALOID5 leaked: Haruno Sora! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Not long ago we talked about YAMAHA’s VOCALOID Shop relaunching soon with multiple products being discontinued, and now, out of the blue, we get a new potential virtual singer listed on Amazon JP: developed by AHS Co. Ltd. Meet Haruno Sora, which seems to be an upcoming addition to VOCALOID’s next engine the unannounced VOCALOID5.

What we know about Haruno Sora

Nothing much is known about this new product from AHS, but one thing seems to be stated clearly on her Amazon description: she’s gonna run on the VOCALOID5 engine and she’s voiced by the popular voice actress Kikuko Inoue, also known as the voice provider for numerous anime and game characters, as well as Macne Coco White and Black from the MACNE series.

Sora will have two different voice banks sold separately and in a bundle: Cool, a vigorous and brisk voice type voice bank that can be used for powerful slowballads and Enka styles. Natural, a more fluffy yet elegant voice that works best with pop and slow ballads. She’ll also get a VOICEROID2 release the same day, July 26th.

Each of her packages are available for preorder via Amazon JP:

VOCALOID5 Haruno Sora Natural
Price: 11,664 JPY
Link to preorder

VOCALOID5 Haruno Sora Cool
Price: 11,664 JPY
Link to preorder

VOCALOID5 Haruno Sora Complete -Natural & Cool-
Price: 19,224 JPY
Link to preorder

VOICEROID2 Haruno Sora
Price: 12,938 JPY
Link to preorder

But what about VOCALOID5

Currently, VOCALOID5 remains unrevealed by YAMAHA, but we can read on Sora’s product page that it not only gets mentioned, but some of it’s features are stated as well. We can clearly see a VOICE COLOR and a ATTACK & RELEASE feature named there, but we still don’t know anything else about those features nor the engine itself.

Considering VOCALOID’s website will be up again soon, all we have to do is wait and see!

Additional informations

We have yet to be introduced officially to Haruno Sora, and we’re still waiting for AHS Software’s announcement, but we’re pretty confident we’ll get some informations soon so stay tuned!

*Note that we are still awaiting official confirmation, therefore some information could change or be different*

The post New VOCALOID5 leaked: Haruno Sora! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Learn Japanese Language & Culture with “Miku dé Nihongo” Book
item.dc:creator: Kuroi
item.description:
A new book titled “Miku dé Nihongo” has been announced by Sanshusha (三修社). This 200 pages book will teach its readers about the Japanese language and culture, using popular songs from our Virtual Diva, Hatsune Miku. All the explanations are written in English! Check out detailed information about the book below. Learn Japanese language and …

The post Learn Japanese Language & Culture with “Miku dé Nihongo” Book appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
A new book titled “Miku dé Nihongo” has been announced by Sanshusha (三修社). This 200 pages book will teach its readers about the Japanese language and culture, using popular songs from our Virtual Diva, Hatsune Miku. All the explanations are written in English! Check out detailed information about the book below.

Learn Japanese language and culture with this collection of 10 famous Hatsune Miku’s songs, a nursery rhyme and an original composition.

Each song (with one exception) shows:
1) The original Japanese lyrics
2) How to read the lyrics in Romanized script
3) The English translation
4) A commentary on Japanese language or culture, reflected in the lyrics
5) Conversation practice with Hatsune Miku.

Recordings of all the lyrics and of the Japanese conversations are downloadable with SONOCA.

◇ Includes our own exclusive recording of the popular VOCALOID producer, teaeye: original “Meguri, natsu” (The Wheel of Seasons: Summer)
◇ Original Miku illustrations for the cover and SONOCA card by borbone
◇ Download voice recordings to practice Japanese conversation with Hatsune Miku

As the songs are introduced and explained in English, it’s a perfect introduction to Hatsune Miku fans overseas.

List of songs:
01. Hello / How are You by HoehoeP
02. Desktop Cinderella by HachiojiP
03. Haru ga Kita (Japanese nursery rhyme)
04. Hajimete no Oto by malo
05. Saihate by Kobayashi Onyx
06. Tell Your World by kz (livetune)
07. Remote Control by WONDERFUL★OPPORTUNITY!
08. Soyokaze Drive by 40mP
09. Sakura no ame by halyosy
10. Meguri, natsu (exclusively composed for this book) by teaeye

How to Purchase

“Miku dé Nihongo” book is available for preorder on amazon Japan for 2,484 yen (about US$ 22.65), with shipment scheduled for June 18th, 2018. Preorder the book here!

Source

Official Product Page

amazon Japan

The post Learn Japanese Language & Culture with “Miku dé Nihongo” Book appeared first on VNN.
